title: The Gold Club: A White Collar Crime Thriller
description: Are you ready for a wild ride through the corporate world? Introducing "The Gold Club" - the latest cozy crime thriller from David Haskell, the creative visionary behind the Orwellian tale "Too Much Information"!Meet Ted Ward, the everyman who's had enough of playing by the rules. He's tired of being overlooked by the Sahara Corporation, and fed up with a life of monotony. But Ted's not one to take it lying down, oh no! He's got a plan, and it's a doozy.Imagine a members-only club, hidden away in the depths of a boring office building, where the elite come to play. Ted's created the ultimate VIP experience, and it's making him rich beyond his wildest dreams. But when the ruthless CEO of Sahara, Dennis Hamm, sets his sights on Ted's club and its profits, the game takes a dangerous turn.Will Ted's dreams of riches go up in smoke? Or will he outsmart Hamm and come out on top? "The Gold Club" is a quirky, crime-filled thrill ride that will have you on the edge of your seat! Don't miss out on this one-of-a-kind caper. Order your copy today!
author: David Deane Haskell
